posts.post_content:
Little background about this guy. He's first deaf player playing in MLB during 1888-1901. Because of him, the umpire's body language has formed.

I wonder if anyone have his card for sale? I have no luck in ebay or google. Thanks.

Here is one for you to watch:

[url]http://legendaryauctions.com/LotDetail.aspx?lotid=111999&searchby=3&searchvalue=old%20judge&page=0&sortby=0&displayby=2&lotsperpage=100&category=1[/url]

[quote name="Joe_G." post=830356]Here is one for you to watch:

[url]http://legendaryauctions.com/LotDetail.aspx?lotid=111999&searchby=3&searchvalue=old%20judge&page=0&sortby=0&displayby=2&lotsperpage=100&category=1[/url][/QUOTE]

Thanks!

Hi ASLPride,

Welcome to this site.  Please e-mail me at [url]scottg@accessmfgsys.com[/url] and we can share some information.  I've been collecting Hoy and Taylor items for a few years and might have something you're interested in.

Thanks,
Scott.
